channel.title: [PI]Quest[PI]
channel.description: Hey Everyone How can i make a quest im doing a christmas event so i wana do a quest. how do i make it so santa talks. and when his done talking to you. he tells u soemthing else. also how do i make it so u have to have an item to go to next step

item.title: [PI]Quest[PI]
item.dc:creator: @caboy_123 caboy 123
item.description:
@caboy_123 wrote:

Thanks Bro. And one More Thing.
This is my code look

		case 1150://santa
		if (c.event == 0) {
			sendNpcChat4("Hello.", "My name is Santa, I'm here for Christmas.", "Would you like to join me in this Christmas Event? ", 
						"to Join please bring me All Six Star Baubles.", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
			c.event++;
			}
			if (c.event == 1 && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6822, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6823, 1)
			&& c.getItems().playerHasItem(6824, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6825, 1)
			&& c.getItems().playerHasItem(6826, 1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(6827, 1)) {
			sendNpcChat2("I See You Got The Star Baubles.", "Thanks For The Getting Them.", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
			c.event++;
			} else {
			sendNpcChat3("Hello Again.", "Dint I tell you to go bring me something? ", 
			"Go bring me all Six Star Baubles ", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
			}
		if (c.event == 2) {
			sendNpcChat4("Thanks For Getting Them.", "Now Go Talk To The", "Easter Bunny ", 
						"He Will Thell You The Rest.", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
			c.event++;
			}
			if (c.event == 3)
 			(c.event == 4){
			sendNpcChat4("You.", "Need To Talk To", "Easter Bunny ", 
			"He Needs Your Help.", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
			}
		if (c.event == 3)
		(c.event == 4){
		sendNpcChat4("You.", "Need To Talk To", "Easter Bunny ", 
		"He Needs Your Help.", c.talkingNpc, "Okay");
		}

i get an erro ther how an i fix this please help

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quest[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

The sendPlayerChat method

sendPlayerChat#("Chat goes here");

The # is the number of lines you want

The max is 4 for one dialogue

example

sendPlayerChat2("Chat goes here", "More chat here");

or

sendPlayerChat4("1st line of chat goes here", "2nd line goes here", "3rd line here", "4th line here");

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quest[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

case ##: //Dialogue case if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995, 200)) { //If the player has 200 coins sendNpcChat1("Thanks for the help", c.talkingNpc, "Santa Clawzz");//Sends 1 line of npc dialogue c.nextChat = X;//next dialogue case } else {//or else if the player does not have 200 coins sendNpcChat1("Hi, Would you like to help me with this?", c.talkingNpc, "Santa Clawzz"); //sends 1 line of npc dialogue c.nextChat = X;//next dialogue case }

Read full topic

like

item.title: [PI]Quest[PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

caboy 123:

how do i make it so santa talks. and when his done talking to you. he tells u soemthing else.

add a new case to the switch statement to the Dialogues switch in Dialoguehandler.java

caboy 123:

and when his done talking to you. he tells u soemthing else.

In that switch include

c.nextChat = X; //X being the case in the switch of the next dialogue you want to occur.
caboy 123:

also how do i make it so u have to have an item to go to next step

Use a conditional which checks if the player has an item,
For PI the method is

c.getItems().playerHasItem(itemId, itemAmount, itemSlot)

Read full topic
